[color=#ffff00][head=3]Section 8: End-of-Round (EOR) Rules[/head][/color]
[color=#a4885c]8.1[/color] End-of-round-griefing (EORG) is not allowed under any circumstance. This includes but is not limited to: fighitng, explosives, chemicals, destruction of property, or any other disruptive behavior. *1
[color=#a4885c]8.2[/color] Central command as well as the Evac shuttle (and evac hallway) are considered Safezones in which this rule takes effect. *1
